title: Messiah - Novel Updates
genre: Drama   Fantasy   Psychological   Sci-fi   Shounen Ai   Tragedy
tags: Aliens   Body Swap   Doctors   Futuristic Setting   Genetic Modifications   Mismatched Couple   Nurses   Past Trauma   Prison   Sharing A Body   Short Story
author: Matthia
description: Sent to prison for attacking his charges money-grubbing wife, the protagonist is given a second chance to get out of prison. He is to be the genocidal Dr. Watson’s nurse. Dr. Watson is a mass murderer from one hundred years ago. Although, he may not seem to be who everyone thinks he is. >
